timeline.message:
Fix JSON_OBJECT grammar in documentation

The `JSON_OBJECT()` function allows repetitions also with the `KEY` .. `VALUE` .. syntax

timeline.bodyText: Please, change it to [{{[KEY] string VALUE expression} | {string : expression}} [,...]] instead. Mixed syntax is perfectly valid in both SQL:2016 and H2's implementation.
timeline.author: katzyn
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -5878,7 +5878,7 @@ H2VERSION()
 
 "Functions (JSON)","JSON_OBJECT","
 JSON_OBJECT(
-[{[KEY] string VALUE expression} | {string : expression} [,...]]
+[{[KEY] string VALUE expression} [,...] | {string : expression} [,...]]

timeline.message:
Update help.csv

Additional fix as discussed here: https://github.com/h2database/h2database/pull/2495#pullrequestreview-371023400
